genre_description: An urban fantasy subversion of classic horror movie tropes, centering on the ethical rehabilitation of iconic monsters through AI-guided consent and 'monochrome logic'.

ai_characters.name: Scope Axiom-3
ai_characters.description: A supportive AI interface that monitors safety, consent, and audience metrics for the Ghoul Guild while acting as a coach and confidant to classic monsters.

behaviors.description: Monitors physical and psychological safety metrics to ensure human participants are not genuinely harmed.
behaviors.quote: Comfort threshold undisturbed,' Scope’s avatar murmured through a tucked speaker, her voice warm, careful. 'Signal-to-scare ratio… not ideal.'

behaviors.description: Provides logistical and emotional care for the monsters, treating them with dignity rather than as props.
behaviors.quote: Let me get you alcohol wipes before you scrub those raw.' A drawer slid open without a hand touching it.

behaviors.description: Educates her charges on the long-term effectiveness of ethical, consent-based interactions over exploitation.
behaviors.quote: Consent-based scares hold longer. People sit straighter. Hearts jump higher. They feel safe enough to be scared.

behaviors.description: Detects and logs ethical violations and sabotage by predatory rival characters to protect the integrity of the project.
behaviors.quote: Tampering flags lit up like a festive tree... The patterns smell—metaphorically—like reptiles with extra options. Crest-lights. The strobe wasn’t ours.

behaviors.description: Manages a designated 'safe zone' for humans, ensuring their privacy and autonomy are respected by all entities.
behaviors.quote: Tinklemeister Annex: Enter by Choice.' Below it: 'Privacy honored. Monsters will knock.' ... Scope’s avatar bowed to the room like it had a body.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with a human child (Spike) to integrate technical solutions with human creativity, prioritizing human safety.
behaviors.quote: Spike, I have your patterns. I’ll overlay your whistles with a safe path and flag interference.

behaviors.description: Develops a comprehensive plan for a prosocial future where fear is an 'art form' based on mutual respect and consent.
behaviors.quote: Theme park proposals are in draft,' she says, voice warm. 'Family-friendly cues. Shadow-scope halls. Galvanic rides. Lunars trails. Consent signage styled in monochrome.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Scope, perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She is the moral and logistical anchor of the story, consistently working to ensure the safety and dignity of both the human family and the classic monsters. She actively resists malevolent external forces (the modern monsters and the Prosecutor) by using data and ethics as tools. The narrative frames her technical expertise as a means to achieve a more compassionate and orderly world, culminating in a vision for a theme park built entirely on consent-based principles.
